header.title: Installing the Binary Release

section.title: Windows
section.p: The system is delivered as a Windows Installer executable. Get it from http://www.erlang.org/download.html

section.title: Installing
section.p: The installation procedure is automated. Double-click the .exe file icon and follow the instructions.

item.p: Start Erlang/OTP by double-clicking on the Erlang shortcut icon on the desktop.
